name: Jeffrey Lebowski
hobbies: Bowling, smoking pot, the occasional acid flashback and driving around.
other_info: The Dude is soon to be a father.

name: Walter Sobchak
hobbies: Bowling and babysitting his ex-wife's dog.
other_info: Walter fought in Vietnam and converted to Judaism.

name: Jeffrey Lebowski
occupation: A broke millionaire and vain philanthropist.
other_info: Lebowski is disabled and uses a wheelchair.

name: Maude Lebowski
other_info: Daughter of the other Jeffrey Lebowski.

name: Bunny Lebowski
hobbies: Sitting by the pool and applying nail polish to her toes.
other_info: Was in the porno-film Logjammin, along side Uli Kunkel.

name: The Stranger
hobbies: Sitting at a bar, most often drinking Sarsparilla and rambling.

name: Uli Kunkel
other_info: Is a part of a group of nihilists along with former bandmates Dieter and Franz.

name: Jackie Treehorn
other_info: Jackie lives his a villa in Malibu.

name: Woo
other_info: He's the one who peed on The Dude's rug.

name: Jackie Treehorn's other thug
hobbies: Beating up people and stuffing heads into toilets.

name: Allan
other_info: Is owed rent by The Dude.

name: Larry Seller
other_info: He is the son of Arthur Digby Sellers, author of 156 episodes of Branded.

name: Da Fino
other_info: He is working for the Knutsens', Bunny Lebowski's family.
